review: I love it! Great price for a great product! Very easy to set up and navigate.
author: Heather

review: I love it, especially since I'm already a Prime Member.  I wish I had heard about it sooner!
author: Patrick Carter

review: Easy to use and I love how fast the Netflix shows load compared how it worked with my old Roku.
author: Jill L. Parmenter

review: I love the Fire Stick!  I am still discovering new ways to use it each day!
author: Judith Price

review: IT does exactly what it was advertised to do,  easy to set up
author: LookingForAGoodTime

review: I 100% recommend this little device. Easy to install and easy to use. With the sling live TV service and Amazon prime streaming media services the Amazon Fire TV can absolutely be a cord cutting solution to nasty cable and satellite contracts. In addition the processing power is superior to to the Google chromcast. Overall I as really amazed by this products low profile and speed.
author: Ben G.
